abstract: Stocks have largest gain in month as investors remain optimistic Britain will remain in European Union.
lead_paragraph: Investors were buying stocks and selling bonds, sending banks higher. Energy shares rose with the price of oil, and materials companies were also up.

headline.main: Wall St. Rises as a ‘Brexit’ Appears Less Likely
headline.print_headline: U.S. Market Rises as Britons Vote

snippet: Investors were buying stocks and selling bonds, sending banks higher. Energy shares rose with the price of oil, and materials companies were also up.
